query:
SELECT 
  sector, 
  COUNT(*) as count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN sample_data IS NOT NULL AND sample_data != '' AND sample_data != '[]' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_sample_data,
  SUM(CASE WHEN screenshot_urls IS NOT NULL AND screenshot_urls != '' AND screenshot_urls != '[]' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_screenshots,
  SUM(CASE WHEN source_url IS NOT NULL AND source_url != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_source_url,
  SUM(CASE WHEN attacker_name IS NOT NULL AND attacker_name != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as has_attacker
FROM leaks 
GROUP BY sector 
ORDER BY count DESC;
